admin_templates.template: {xen:phrase BRC_action_moderate_hint} {xen:phrase BRC_0_to_unlimited} {xen:phrase BRC_0_to_unlimited} {xen:phrase BRC_0_to_unlimited}

<xen:title>{xen:if '{$event.event_id}', '{xen:phrase BRC_edit_event}: {$action.title}', '{xen:phrase BRC_create_new_event}'}</xen:title>
<xen:if is="{$event.event_id}"> <xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events'}">{xen:phrase BRC_list_actions}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events'}#{xen:helper listitemid, $event.event_id}">{$action.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation> <xen:else /> <xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events'}">{xen:phrase BRC_list_events}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events/add'}">{xen:phrase BRC_create_new_event}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation> </xen:if>

<fieldset> <xen:comment> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_action_id">{xen:phrase BRC_action_id}:</label></dt> <dd> {$action.action_id} </dd> </dl> </xen:comment> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_action_id">{xen:phrase title}:</label></dt> <dd> {$action.title} </dd> </dl> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_action_id">{xen:phrase explanation}:</label></dt> <dd> {$action.description} </dd> </dl> </fieldset> <fieldset> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_currency}" name="currency_id" value="{$event.currency_id}" inputclass="autoSize" hint="{xen:phrase BRC_action_currency_hint}"> <xen:options source="$currencyOptions" /> </xen:selectunit> </fieldset> <fieldset> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase user_groups}" name="user_groups" value="{xen:raw $event.user_groups}" size="10" multiple="true"> <xen:options source="$userGroups" /> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase BRC_action_user_groups_hint}</xen:explain> </xen:selectunit> </fieldset>

<xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_head" /> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events/save'}" method="post" data-redirect="on" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator"> <xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_header" /> <fieldset> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_amount}:" name="amount" value="{$event.amount}" hint="{xen:phrase BRC_action_amount_hint}" /> <xen:if is="{$action.revert}"> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_negative_amount}:" name="sub_amount" value="{$event.sub_amount}" hint="{xen:phrase BRC_action_sub_amount_hint}" /> </xen:if> </fieldset> <xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_footer" /> </xen:form>

<xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_head" /> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events/save'}" method="post" data-redirect="on" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator"> <xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_header" /> <fieldset> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_amount}:" name="amount" value="{$event.amount}" min="0"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase BRC_action_amount_hint}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_year_amount}:" name="multiplier" value="{$event.multiplier}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase BRC_action_year_amount_hint}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit> </fieldset> <fieldset> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_minimum_years}:" name="extra_min" value="{$event.extra_min}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase BRC_0_for_no_minimum}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_maximum_years}:" name="extra_max" value="{$event.extra_max}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase BRC_exceeded_amounts_ignored}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit> <xen:radiounit name="extra_min_handle" label="{xen:phrase BRC_below_minimum_handling}" value="{xen:raw $event.extra_min_handle}"> <xen:option label="{xen:phrase do_nothing}" value="0"></xen:option> <xen:option label="{xen:phrase BRC_exclude_year_amounts}" value="1"></xen:option> <xen:option label="{xen:phrase BRC_exclude_entire_event}" value="2"></xen:option> </xen:radiounit> </fieldset> <xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_footer" /> </xen:form>

<xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_head" /> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events/save'}" method="post" data-redirect="on" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator"> <xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_header" /> <fieldset> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase forums}" name="forums" value="{xen:raw $event.forums}" size="10" multiple="true"> <xen:options source="$forums" /> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase BRC_action_forums_hint}</xen:explain> </xen:selectunit> </fieldset> <fieldset> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_amount}:" name="amount" value="{$event.amount}" hint="{xen:phrase BRC_action_amount_hint}" /> <xen:if is="{$action.revert}"> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_negative_amount}:" name="sub_amount" value="{$event.sub_amount}" hint="{xen:phrase BRC_action_sub_amount_hint}" /> </xen:if> </fieldset>
<xen:include template="BRC_action_editTemplate_footer" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase BRC_confirm_import}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase BRC_confirm_import}</xen:h1> <xen:require css="delete_confirmation.css" /> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'credits/import-trophy-points'}" class="deleteConfirmForm formOverlay xenForm"> <xen:selectunit name="currency_id" label="{xen:phrase BRC_currency}" id="ctrl_currency_id"> <xen:foreach loop="$currencies" key="$_currency" value="$currency"> <xen:option value="{$currency.currency_id}" label="{$currency.title}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:selectunit> <xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase options}" name="type" value="{$type}"> <xen:option value="merge" label="{xen:phrase BRC_merge_credits}"></xen:option> <xen:option value="override" label="{xen:phrase BRC_override_credits}"></xen:option> </xen:radiounit> <xen:if is="{$trophyPoints}"> <xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_remove_trophy_points}"> <xen:option name="remove_trophy_points"></xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit> </xen:if> <xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase submit}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase BRC_statistics_of_x,'action={$action.title}'}{xen:phrase statistics}
{xen:phrase BRC_total_board_credits}:
{xen:helper brc_currencyformat, {$totalCredits},true,{$currency.currency_id}}

{xen:number $totalUsers}
{xen:phrase start_date}:
{xen:datetime {$firstDay},'absolute'}
{xen:phrase BRC_total_earned_credits}:
{xen:helper brc_currencyformat, {$statisticRecord.total_earn},true,{$currency.currency_id}} ( {xen:helper brc_currencyformat, {$earnedPerday},true,{$currency.currency_id}}/{xen:phrase day} )
{xen:phrase BRC_total_spent_credits}:
{xen:helper brc_currencyformat, {$statisticRecord.total_spend},true,{$currency.currency_id}} ( {xen:helper brc_currencyformat, {$spentPerday},true,{$currency.currency_id}}/{xen:phrase day} )

{xen:helper brc_currencyformat, {$todayStatisticRecord.total_earn},true,{$currency.currency_id}}
{xen:phrase BRC_today_spent_credits}:

<xen:title>{xen:phrase BRC_create_new_event}</xen:title>
<xen:h1>{xen:phrase BRC_create_new_event}</xen:h1>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'brc-events/add'}"> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_action}:" name="action_id" inputclass="autoSize"> <xen:foreach loop="$renderedActions" key="$key" value="$_group"> <xen:options source="$_group" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:selectunit> <xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase proceed}..." /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{$event.title}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase BRC_export_event}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink brc-events/export}"> <xen:selectunit name="currency_id" label="{xen:phrase BRC_export_from_currency}:"> <xen:options source="$currencyOptions" /> </xen:selectunit> <xen:include template="helper_addon_unit" /> <xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase BRC_export_event}" saveclass="OverlayCloser" resetclass="OverlayCloser" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase BRC_import_event}</xen:title> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink brc-events/import}" upload="true"> <xen:uploadunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_import_from_uploaded_file}:" name="upload" /> <xen:selectunit name="currency_id" label="{xen:phrase BRC_import_to_currency}:"> <xen:options source="$currencyOptions" /> </xen:selectunit> <xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase import}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:selectunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" multiple="multiple" size="20" hint="{$preparedOption.hint}" inputclass="{$preparedOption.inputClass}" value="{xen:raw $preparedOption.option_value}"> <xen:option value="" label="({xen:phrase none})" /> <xen:options source="$formatParams" /> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

<xen:selectunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" multiple="multiple" size="5" hint="{$preparedOption.hint}" inputclass="{$preparedOption.inputClass}" value="{xen:raw $preparedOption.option_value}"> <xen:option value="" label="({xen:phrase BRC_all_currencies})" /> <xen:options source="$formatParams" /> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

<xen:checkboxunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" hint="{$preparedOption.hint}"> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain>
<xen:option label="{xen:phrase BRC_visitor_tab_display}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][navigation_visitor_tabs_end]" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.navigation_visitor_tabs_end}" /> <xen:option label="{xen:phrase BRC_message_user_info_display}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][message_user_info_extra]" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.message_user_info_extra}"/> <xen:option label="{xen:phrase BRC_visitor_sidebar_panel_display}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][sidebar_visitor_panel_stats]" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.sidebar_visitor_panel_stats}"/> <xen:option label="{xen:phrase BRC_member_view_display}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][member_view_info_block]" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.member_view_info_block}"/> <xen:option label="{xen:phrase BRC_member_card_display}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][member_card_stats]" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.member_card_stats}"/>
<xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase BRC_confirm_reset_all_credit}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase BRC_confirm_reset_all_credit}</xen:h1> <xen:require css="delete_confirmation.css" /> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'credits/reset-credit'}" class="deleteConfirmForm formOverlay xenForm"> <xen:selectunit name="currency_id" label="{xen:phrase BRC_currency}" id="ctrl_currency_id"> <xen:option value="" label="({xen:phrase BRC_all_currencies})" /> <xen:optgroup label=""> <xen:foreach loop="$currencies" key="$_currency" value="$currency"> <xen:option value="{$currency.currency_id}" label="{$currency.title}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:optgroup> </xen:selectunit> <xen:radiounit value='all' label="{xen:phrase BRC_reset_type}" name="type"> <xen:option value="all" label="{xen:phrase all}" /> <xen:option value="user" label="{xen:phrase username}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:textbox name="username" inputclass="quickSearchText AutoComplete AcSingle" placeholder="{xen:phrase username}..." type="search" results="5" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> <xen:option value="usergroup" label="{xen:phrase user_groups}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:select name="user_group"> <xen:options source="$userGroups" /> </xen:select> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> </xen:radiounit> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_reset_all_user_credits_to}:" name="amount" value="0"/> <xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_delete_all_transactions}"> <xen:option name="delete_transaction"></xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit> <xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase reset}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase BRC_transfer}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase BRC_transfer}</xen:h1> <xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink credits/transfer}">{xen:phrase BRC_transfer}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation> <xen:form action="{xen:adminlink credits/do-transfer}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay {$currencyId} AutoValidator" data-redirect="yes"> <xen:selectunit name="currency_id" value="{$currencyId}" label="{xen:phrase BRC_currency}"> <xen:foreach loop="$currencies" key="$_currency" value="$currency"> <xen:option value="{$currency.currency_id}" label="{$currency.title}" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_anonymous_transfer}"> <xen:option name="anonymous"></xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase BRC_anonymous_transfer_hint}</xen:explain> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase BRC_transfer_type}" name="type" value="{$type}"> <xen:option value="user" label="{xen:phrase BRC_receiver}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:textbox name="receiver" value="{$receiver}" inputclass="quickSearchText AutoComplete" placeholder="{xen:phrase BRC_receiver}..." type="search" results="5" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> <xen:option value="usergroup" label="{xen:phrase user_groups}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:select name="user_group"> <xen:options source="$userGroups" /> </xen:select> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> </xen:radiounit> <xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase BRC_transfer_from}" name="from" value="{$from}"> <xen:option value="self" label="{xen:phrase BRC_self}" hint="{xen:phrase BRC_transfer_using_your_credit_to_sent_to_member}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:spinbox name="amount" value="1" step="1" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> <xen:option value="system" label="{xen:phrase BRC_system}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:spinbox name="amount" value="1" step="1" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> </xen:radiounit> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase BRC_note}:" name="comment" rows="2" value="" inputclass="Elastic" /> <xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase BRC_do_transfer}"> </xen:submitunit> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> <input type="hidden" name="redirect" value="{$requestPaths.requestUri}" /> </xen:form>

modification.replace: $0

code_events.event:
Called after the Brivium - Credit Premium II is loaded. This event can be used to add the class of custom action that will be use for credit event.

Callback signature:

array &$actions

Arguments:

  1. array $actions - the list of the action handler classes
    - key: action type ( must unique)
    - value: action class

To use this event properly, determine if the class is one you want to extend. If so, add a new entry to $extend with the name of the class that should extend it. This class MUST be defined as follows:

class My_Class_Name extends Brivium_Credits_ActionHandler_Abstract
{
	// functionality to extend/override
}

template.title: BRCP_user_email_payment_info
template.subject: {xen:phrase BRCP_new_payment_on_x, "board_title={$boardTitle}"}
template.body_html:
{xen:phrase BRCP_user_email_payment_info_body_html, 'username={$user.username}', 'paypal_gross={$paypalData.mc_gross}', 'paypal_currency={$paypalData.mc_currency}', 'transaction_time={xen:datetime $transactionTime}', 'current_credit={xen:helper brc_currencyformat, $currentCredit,false,$currency.currency_id}', 'message={$dataCredit.message}', 'board_title={$boardTitle}', 'board_link={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:link canonical:index}
{xen:link canonical:index}

option.edit_format_params: USD=US DOLLARS AUD=AUSTRALIAN DOLLARS GBP=BRITISH POUNDS CAD=CANADIAN DOLLARS CZK=CZECH KORUNA DKK=DANISH KRONER EUR=EUROS HKD=HONG KONG DOLLARS HUF=HUNGARIAN FORINT JPY=JAPANESE YEN NZD=NEW ZEALAND DOLLARS NOK=NORWEGIAN KRONER PLN=POLISH ZLOTYCH SGD=SINGAPORE DOLLARS SEK=SWEDISH KRONOR CHF=SWISS FRANCS
homepage=HomePage location=Location occupation=Occupation dob_day=Day of Birth dob_month=Month of Birth dob_year=Year of Birth about=About avatar_date=Avatar

phrases.phrase: Extra amount of credits that member will get after purchased via paypal
The transaction was completed and you will receive an email confirming your payment. You can login to your account at https://www.paypal.com/ to see transaction details.
Thank you for buying credits. Have nice day.

Dear {username},

Thanks for purchasing credits at {board_title}
Your purchasing is complete and you're all set to start using credits at {board_title}.

-----------------------------------
Transaction details
-----------------------------------
Amount: {paypal_gross} {paypal_currency}
Transaction Date: {transaction_time}
Your current credits: {current_credit}
Note: {message}

Regards,
{board_link}
Alert user when they trigger this action.
After this event has occured this many times, the action will occur without triggering the event again.
Assigns points when someone downloading user's attachment. Multiplier is filesize.
Assigns credits to user which have birthday (only one time in year when user have his/her birthday). Multiplier is age.
Assigns or remove credits when get a reply of conversation.
Assigns credits when a user's conversation get deleted.
Assigns credits when a user create new conversation
Assigns credits when a user create a poll.
Assigns credits when a user create new thread
Multiple currencies can be set to the same action in different events.
Increase or reduced creadits when a user download an attachment file.
Choose currency will be affected by this event.
Choose who will be affected by this action
Moving your own currency from one to another.
Assigns credits after user associate with their facebook account
Assigns credits after user disassociate with their facebook account
Extra amount deducted from the amount being transferred.
Assigns or remove credits when a user unfollow.
Assigns or remove credits when a user follow.
The specific forums this event occurs. If none are selected then all forums will be applicable. Ctrl/cmd+click or click+drag to select more than one.
Assigns or remove credits when a user lost follower
Assigns or remove credits when a user get follower
Assigns or remove credits when a user get/lost follower
Assigns credits when someone comment on user's profile page.
Assigns credits after user associate with google account
Assigns credits after user disassociate with their google account
Action Ids must be unique. The specified action id is already in use.
Growing the value of user's credits over time.
Assigns or remove credits when a user unlike a post.
Assigns or remove credits when a user like a post.
Assigns or remove credits when a user unlike a profile post
Assigns or remove credits when a user like a profile post
Assigns credits for each daily login
Timespan in seconds that the above maximum is enforced.
Earning events can be held for approval in the transaction manager. Until rejected, moderated events count towards the maximum below.
Assigns credits when a user create new post.
Refund or revert Paypal payment action
Assigns credits when a user's poll get a vote
Assign credits when a post of user was deleted.
Remove credits when a post of user get reported.
Assigns credits when a user post comment on other member's profile page
Assign credits when a user read a thread.
Assigns or remove credits when a user receive conversation
Assigns or remove credits when a user lost a post like.
Assigns or remove credits when a user receive a post like.
Assigns or remove credits when a user lost profile post like
Assigns or remove credits when a user receive profile post like
Assigns or remove credits when a user reply conversation
Someone else posting in your thread.
Assigns or remove credits when a user report a post. You can use positive or negative values.
Title when this action is reverted.
Action trigger when a user steal other credits
Charged when this action is reverted.
Generally when currency is involved you only want to adjust the amount for one user. Choose who will be affected in such a transaction between users.
Extra percentage in decimal form deducted from amount being transferred.
Assign credits when a thread of user was deleted.
Assigns credits when someone posting in user's thread.
Assigns credits when a user's thread get unwatched
Assigns credits when a user's thread get watched
Assigns or remove credits when a user's thread becomes unsticky
Assigns or remove credits when a user's thread becomes sticky
Assigns credits when someone viewing user's thread. Actions should be limited.
Maximum times user can trigger this action per day.
Calculate tax and fee when a user transfer credits to other.
Assigns credits when user reward a trophy.
Assigns credits after user associate with their twitter account
Assigns credits after user disassociate with their twitter account
Assigns credits when a user's profile down and becomes incomplete
Assigns credits when a user has 100% completed his / her profile. Assigns 50% complete with avatar. 50% with about, birthday, gender, hometown (city), occupation and homepage information.
Assigns credits when a user update status.
Assigns points when a user delete an attachment.
Assigns points when a user upload new attachment.
Assigns or remove credits when a user delete avatar.
Assigns or remove credits when a user upload avatar.
The specific usergroups this action applies to. If none are selected then all users will be qualified. Ctrl/cmd+click or click+drag to select more than one.
Assigns points to the user after he responded to a poll. Multiplier is the number selected.
Assigns credits when a user unwatch thread
Assigns credits when a user watch
Awarded for each Word along with the Action amount when this action occurs.
Awarded for each Year along with the Birthday amount when this action occurs.
You lost {amount} for delete an attachment.
You get {amount} for upload new {attachCount} attachment(s).
Amount using must bigger than {amount} to do this action.
Amount using must smaller than {amount} to do this action.
Hide your name and your information to victim.
Hide your name and your information to receiver.
Columns must be unique. The specified column is already in use.
Sorry, this currency can not withdraw
Users will be unable to exceed this amount earned. Use 0 for no maximum.
Code will display with currency value. You may use html. Ex: <img src="http://your_icon_link.com" />
After creation, this should stay the same even if you change the title later or loss of data may result. If this column does not exist on 'xf_user', it will be added.
If enabled, other currencies may be transferred to this one.
How to treat negative amounts that sometimes occur from uncancelable actions and event negation.
If enabled, this currency can be transferred to other applicable currencies.

This is the overall value of this currency compared to all other currencies. Generally this only matters when determining total assets and transfering between currencies. You should establish at least one currency with a value of 1 as a base against the rest.
Timespan in seconds that the above maximum is enforced. Use 0 for all time.
The specific usergroups will using private currencies. If none are selected then all users will be qualified. Ctrl/cmd+click or click+drag to select more than one.
You do not have permission to anonymous steal credits.
You do not have permission to anonymous transfer.
Event Actions must be unique within currency. The specified Event is already in use.
Exceeded amounts are ignored. Use blank for no maximum.
You can not exchange to same currency
The following receiver could not be found: {username}.
The interface of your credits can be displayed to you using any of the currencies you may pick here.
It is not possible to delete the last currency.
It is not possible to remove the default currency.
You do not have {amount} to do this action.
You do not have {amount} to transfer.
You did not enter a valid amount
No events have been created for this action yet.
Credits Received = Money Paid (after tax and fee) / Exchange Rate
Money Paid = Money Paid - Fee Amount
Please confirm that you want to delete the following action
Please confirm that you want to delete the following currency
Please confirm that you want to delete the following action event
Please confirm that you want to delete the following transaction
Please confirm that you want to delete the {number} selected transactions.
Please confirm that you want to reset all user's credit
Sorry, this post needs to have at least {min} words.
The requested action could not be found.
The requested currency could not be found.
The requested receivers could not be found.
This action is not active yet
This currency is not active yet
This event is not active yet
You cannot transfer the same currency to yourself
This transfer using your credits to send to member
What kind of template do you want to use?
Your credits must bigger than {amount} to do this action.
You can get reward {time} times in period of time for {event}
You can get reward {time} times per day for {event}
This controls the minimum and maximum number of credit purchase. Use 0 to disable a limit.
When enabled, the number of words in a text will be used for the size multipliers, otherwise it will be the number of characters.
Enable Low Priority Update SQL Queries

This enables the use of UPDATE LOW_PRIORITY SQL queries for elements such as update credits to increase performance. We only recommend disabling this if your host complains about "long MySQL connections" due to a misconception of what those connections represent.
Exclude Block BBCode from Size Multipliers
When enabled, the content within [QUOTE], [PHP], [HTML], [CODE] will be ignored when calculating text sizes. Whitespace, Markup BBCodes, and Smilies will be ignored regardless.
List the file extensions that are ignored to be download action. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
Member must complete those fields to complete their profile.
Allow Guests to Trigger View Actions

Actions which occur for the owners of content when someone else views them could potentially be seen by guests. It is recommended that this is disabled should the owner log out and view their own content. Include Thread View And Attachment Download
Limit the number of members to show on each top of credits statistic.
After transaction deleted, credits will return to user.
This controls the maximum number of transactions that will be shown on one page.

Withdrawal exchange rate to calculate an amount an user can receive if he/she withdraws.
Credits Received = Money Withdraw / (Exchange Rate x Currency Amount)

<xen:title>{xen:phrase BRC_edit_credits}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase BRC_edit_credits}: {$user.username}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link members/edit-credits, $user}" method="post" class="xenForm Transfer formOverlay AutoValidator" data-redirect="yes"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase member}:</dt> <dd> {xen:helper richUserName, $user} </dd> </dl> <fieldset> <xen:foreach loop="$currencies" key="$_currency" value="$currency"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_amount_{$_currency}">{$currency.title}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="{$currency.column}" value="{xen:calc 'round({$user.{$currency.column}},{$currency.decimal_place})'}" step="1" min="1" class="textCtrl number SpinBox" id="ctrl_amount_{$_currency}" autocomplete="off"> </dd> </dl> </xen:foreach> </fieldset>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase save}" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> <input type="hidden" name="redirect" value="{$requestPaths.requestUri}" /> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="{$user.user_id}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </form>

<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_amount">{xen:phrase BRC_amount}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="amount" value="1" step="1" min="1" class="textCtrl number SpinBox" id="ctrl_amount" autocomplete="off"> </dd> </dl> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_currency_id">{xen:phrase BRC_from}:</label></dt> <dd> <select id="ctrl_currency_id" name="from" class="textCtrl autoSize submitOnChange" value="0" > <xen:foreach loop="$fromCurrencies" key="$ci" value="$currency"> <option value="{$currency.currency_id}" {xen:selected "{$currencyId} == '{$currency.currency_id}'"}>{$currency.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select> </dd> </dl> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_currency_id">{xen:phrase BRC_to}:</label></dt> <dd> <select id="ctrl_currency_id" name="to" class="textCtrl autoSize submitOnChange" value="0" > <xen:foreach loop="$toCurrencies" key="$ci" value="$currency"> <option value="{$currency.currency_id}" {xen:selected "{$currencyId} == '{$currency.currency_id}'"}>{$currency.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select> </dd> </dl>

    {xen:if '{$transaction.moderate}','{xen:phrase BRC_pending}','{xen:phrase BRC_complete}'}
    {xen:raw $transaction.message}

{xen:phrase BRC_transfer} {xen:phrase BRC_transfer} {xen:phrase BRC_credit} {xen:phrase BRC_transfer}

{xen:phrase BRC_anonymous_transfer_hint}
{xen:phrase BRC_withdraw} {xen:phrase BRC_withdraw} {xen:phrase BRC_credit} {xen:phrase BRC_withdraw}

modification.description: Change Big Number to credit format
